about.title: About BusUrbano
about.description: Web app to find stops and arrival times for urban buses.
about.data_sources_intro: This application uses data from multiple sources:
about.thanks_council: Special thanks to Vigo City Council for providing this data under an open license.

stoplist.search_placeholder: Search stop by name or code...
stoplist.no_favourites: Go to a stop and mark it as favourite to see it here.
stoplist.alerts_description: Service alerts and disruption notifications will be available here soon.

estimates.caption: Arrival estimates at {{time}}
estimates.unknown_service: Unknown service. It may be a reinforcement or the service has a different name than planned.

timetable.noDataAvailable: No timetable data available for today
timetable.errorDetail: Theoretical timetables are updated daily. Please try again later.

planner.where_to: Where do you want to go?
planner.no_routes_message: We couldn't find a route for your trip. Try changing the time or locations.

common.404: The requested page could not be found.

favourites.title: Favourites
favourites.empty: You don't have any favourite stops yet.
favourites.empty_description: Go to a stop and mark it as favourite to see it here.

lines.description: Below is a list of Vigo urban bus lines with their respective routes and links to official timetables.

stop_help.title: Estimates guide
stop_help.realtime_ok_desc: The bus is theoretically running, and the estimate is based on reliable real-time data.
stop_help.realtime_warning_desc: We have real-time data for a trip that hasn't left the terminus yet. The estimate might be too optimistic, or pessimistic close to departure.
stop_help.scheduled_desc: No real-time data available. Showing theoretical arrival time based on schedule data. Usually happens at the start of some combined lines or the first trip of the day.
stop_help.gps_desc: Indicates we know the approximate location of the bus, based on the distance in meters reported by the operator and the route we believe it's following.
stop_help.punctuality_ontime: The bus is running on schedule (within a courtesy margin).
stop_help.punctuality_early: The bus is running early (2 minutes or more).
stop_help.punctuality_late: The bus is running late (4 minutes or more).
stop_help.gps_reliable: GPS data is from the current trip, and the position is a reliable estimate.
stop_help.gps_imprecise: GPS data seems to indicate the bus is on the previous trip (possibly from another line). The position might not be reliable.
